# Merrilin

> Read Naturally, Ask Freely

Merrilin is an AI-powered reading companion. It lets you read EPUB books in the browser and ask an AI assistant questions about what you're reading â€” with built-in spoiler safety for fiction.

## Features

- Spoiler-safe AI chat that adapts to your reading progress in fiction
- Full-context AI answers for non-fiction
- Cross-device reading position sync
- Multiple themes (dark, light, sepia) and customizable typography
- Library with shelf, grid, list, and thumbnail views
- Reading analytics and progress tracking
- Highlight and annotate passages
- Share quotes as images
- Series tracking and organization

## Links

- Website: https://merrilin.ai
- GitHub: https://github.com/merrilin-ai
